predicate.note: Frames file for 'intimate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: no hearer
example.text: Let me immediately put limits to whatever nostalgic notions that may intimate [*T*-1].

example.name: with hearer
example.text: John intimated to Mary something that made her blush furiously.
